imageDescription: Robonaut with gold visor in spacecraft, representing human-machine hybrids making decisions before Earth is aware.

name: Largest Object

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'outburst', 'ice'. Destination: Comet Holmes (Season Red).

imageDescription: Comet Holmes glowing red after an unexplained mass ejection that briefly made it larger than the sun.

name: Goldilocks Luna Terraform

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: You do not need permission to Prospect or use Factories on Luna. When Fulfilling: Discard Factories & Colonies on Luna; owners receive 8 Aquas/token removed. Destination: Icarus (Season Red).

imageDescription: Moon and atmospheric glow representing terraforming using outer dropstone moons to create a lunar rock-steam atmosphere.

name: Submersible Prospector

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Submarine Site.

imageDescription: Spherical submersible with holes in subsurface ocean, exploring sites that may harbor exotic chemistries or life.

name: Ring Industrialization

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'ring'; your Mobile Factories on 'ring' Hazards are C Factories. Destination: Using your freighter, enter Saturn flyby, & stop on crash Hazard on the same Turn.

imageDescription: Spacecraft near Saturn's rings with mechanical arms, mining facility using drones to collect ice and dust.

name: Beehive

ocr.ability: When Fulfilling: Remove Busted disk; prospect here at ISRU 0 w/reroll. Destination: Operational robonaut & refinery at Busted Size 1 Site.

imageDescription: Interior view of O'Neill cylinder habitat with forests and buildings, hollow worlds spun to create artificial gravity.

name: Daedalus Starship Research

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. When Fulfilling: Decommission Colocated GW/TW thruster, supports; gain 12 Aquas. Destination: Operational GW/TW thruster at Comet Neujmin I (Season Blue).

imageDescription: Technical blueprint of Daedalus starship design, focusing on isotope collection for interstellar missions.

name: Sun-fired Laser

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Negotiable. Destination: Mercury L1 to Mercury L3 in 1 Turn.

imageDescription: The Sun's fiery surface representing a power-beaming swarm of sun-fired lasers in inclined orbits.

name: Ice Phase Research

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Ganymede, Quaoar, or Comet Holmes Site.

imageDescription: Ganymede's cratered icy surface, studying structural changes of water ice over thermal history.

name: Green Magnetosphere

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Mars Site, then Sol-Mars L1.

imageDescription: Mars with artificial magnetic field lines, Dr. James Green's proposal to prevent atmospheric erosion.

name: Nuclear-Electric Airship

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Unexplored Atmospheric Site & a different unexplored Atmospheric Site.

imageDescription: Solar-powered flying wing aircraft above clouds, reconnaissance airplane using advanced Stirling radioisotope generator.

name: Aerover Blimp Explorer

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Unexplored Atmospheric Site.

imageDescription: Multiple reconnaissance blimps descending through Mars atmosphere, powered by microwaves from mothership.

name: Solar Nebula Mafics

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Phoebe.

imageDescription: Four thermal maps of Phoebe moon showing compositional diversity second only to Earth.

name: Mosquito

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Insight. Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ S Site.

imageDescription: Lander with drill strings on Mars surface, superdeep drills exploring world interiors for water and volatiles.

name: Planetary Rail Network

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Your Colony connected by buggy road to any Colony.

imageDescription: Solar or nuclear powered light rail on lunar surface, useful for surface transport and accelerating payloads.

name: Planetary Protection

ocr.ability: When Fulfilling: Bust the destination Site & place up to 2 delegates in any 1 Ideology. Destination: Unexplored Signposted (4A7d) Site.

imageDescription: Aerial view of colorful Mars crater, representing COSPAR recommendations to protect worlds from biological contamination.

name: Subnubilar Zeppelin

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Any player's Colony at an Atmospheric Site not in Mars zone.

imageDescription: Zeppelin airship above clouds, aerostat exploration observing surface directly and diving to supercritical ocean.

name: Bio-Inspired Rover

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Unexplored Astrobiology Site.

imageDescription: Ingenuity-style helicopter drone on Mars surface, solar-powered rovers exploring at fraction of rocket probe energy.

name: Spaceborn Political Rally

ocr.ability: When Fulfilling: Exomigrate to isobank; Discard a different Colonist. Destination: Isobank with a spaceborn or Promoted Colonist.

imageDescription: Robonaut and astronaut face to face, representing political rally against discrimination of spaceborn humans.

name: Junket

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: 2 different BEO Colonies (any Players') & Return.

imageDescription: Astronaut in space station looking at Earth, representing a grandstanding politician touring space colonies.

name: Chipjack

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: You may perform implant Operations at your Colonies. When Fulfilling: 'Target' Colonist moves to LEO unless owner Discards 8 Aqua. Destination: Your Colonist Colocated with a 'target' augmented Colonist beyond Ceres zone.

imageDescription: Close-up of medical implant procedure, representing highly augmented supermen as targets for jealous competitors.

name: Drug Smuggling

ocr.ability: When Fulfilling: Owner of destination Colony Discards 4 Aquas or the Colony. Destination: Any player's BEO Colony.

imageDescription: Petri dish with biological cultures, representing contraband drugs and alcohol valued in lonely space reaches.

name: Trojan Listening Posts

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Agamemnon/Aeneas & Return.

imageDescription: Jupiter Trojan asteroids in space, equipment at distant sites to monitor inner and outer Solar System.

name: Cancer Research Mission

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Comet Phaethon & Return (Season Yellow).

imageDescription: Microscopic view of cells, rare isotopes for radiotherapy using triggered decay to target cancer cells precisely.

name: Mercury Sunset Convoy

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Any player's Mercury Colony with augmented Colonist and Operational buggy robonaut.

imageDescription: Mercury's cratered surface map, where slow rotation allows driving along the surface to maintain permanent sunset.

name: Rescue Team

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: You are allowed Murder/Suicide. Destination: Human Crew/Colonist at Site beyond Mars zone or Size 9+.

imageDescription: Astronaut in space station medical bay, representing extreme cost of high delta-v rescue missions.

name: Refueling Trawler

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Aqua gained. Air-eater refueling is a 1/Turn free action. Destination: Aerobrake Space beyond Jupiter zone.

imageDescription: Spacecraft cockpit view above gas giant clouds, trawling collector system to scoop gases from thermosphere.

name: SWIV Miner

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ zero Hydration Site & Return.

imageDescription: Mining facility with tanks and conveyor on planetary surface, robonautic trucks collecting solar wind implanted isotopes.

name: Skyhook

ocr.ability: When Fulfilling: Build a Space Elevator at this Site (no Hazard Roll). Destination: Your Factory Site at one end of a Space Elevator icon.

imageDescription: Earth with rotating tether system and spacecraft, skyhook boosting payloads via momentum transfer.

name: Tsiolkovsky Elevator Lab

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Your factory-assist landings/liftoffs at Elevator Sites treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces. Destination: Unexplored Size 2+ Space Elevator Site, then liftoff from that Site.

imageDescription: Space elevator extending from Earth into orbit, experimentation to understand practical forces and materials.

name: Ring Rain

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'ring'. Destination: Rhea.

imageDescription: Saturn with visible ring system and electromagnetic erosion causing rain of ice from the rings.

name: Spin Control

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: 'spin'. Destination: Hazard Space adjacent to Comet Phaethon (Season Yellow).

imageDescription: Tumbling asteroid or comet rotating on three axes, extremely challenging for human navigation and landing.

name: Sunrise Project

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Shielded. Destination: Unexplored Atmospheric Site beyond Jupiter zone & Return.

imageDescription: Dim alien sunset/sunrise on distant world, capturing pristine sunrises on alien planets before industrialization.

name: Search for Life Center

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Transport. Destination: Echeclus & Return.

imageDescription: Colorful alien landscape with geothermal features, studying chirality of organic molecules to detect carbon-based life.

name: Deep Space One

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Sycorax.

imageDescription: Uranus, the easiest source for bulk quantities of clean fusion fuel Helium-3 in high demand on Earth.

name: Yarkovsky Research

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Davida.

imageDescription: Large asteroid Davida, studying the YORP effect that changes asteroid rotation from solar scattering and thermal emission.

name: Classified Security Payload

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Comet Crommelin (Season Yellow).

imageDescription: Interior of spacecraft cargo bay with redacted/classified text, representing secret military payload.

name: Hardened Base

ocr.ability: Fulfilled Ability: Secured. Destination: Cruithne.

imageDescription: Buried bunker installation on asteroid surface, hardened against threats at abandoned prospecting sites.

name: United Nations Cosmonauts (A)

ocr.ability: SECRETARY GENERAL: Start the game with +2 Aqua.

imageDescription: Card featuring the United Nations emblem with laurel wreath and globe, alongside the Liberty rocket with red, white and blue striping.

name: ROSCOSMOS (B)

ocr.ability: TAXES: +1 Aqua after any player places a Claim or industrializes.

imageDescription: Card showing the ROSCOSMOS logo and the Angara 5 rocket, a Russian heavy-lift launch vehicle with green and white staging.

name: Taikonauts (C)

ocr.ability: FELONIOUS: May perform Felonious actions.

imageDescription: Card displaying the CNSA (China National Space Administration) blue arrow logo and The Long March 9 heavy rocket with multiple boosters.

name: NASA Astronauts (D)

ocr.ability: LAUNCH FEES: +1 Aqua from the Pool after any player performs a boost operation.

imageDescription: Card showing the classic NASA meatball logo and the SLS (Space Launch System) 130t Block II Crew rocket, a white heavy-lift vehicle with orange tank.

name: Anonymous P2P (E)

ocr.ability: OPEN SOURCE FINAO: Costs of FINAO is 3 Aqua.

imageDescription: Card featuring the iconic Guy Fawkes/Anonymous mask and the Skylon spaceplane, a sleek black single-stage-to-orbit vehicle design.

name: ESA Space Unionists (F)

ocr.ability: POWERSAT: During any player's turn: May give +1 thrust to any spacecraft that in their thruster triangle has a solar sail icon.

imageDescription: Card showing the POWERSAT/ESA circular logo with satellite imagery and the Ariane 64 rocket, a white European launch vehicle.

name: ISRO Glavcosmonauts (G)

ocr.ability: DHARMA REFUEL: Double yield from site refuel when carrying a glory chit.

imageDescription: Card displaying the ISRO (Indian Space Research Organisation) logo with Sanskrit text and the GSLV MkIII (Vikas) rocket with 'INDIA' markings.

name: B612 Foundation (H)

ocr.ability: BLINK TELESCOPE: 1 re-roll per prospecting operation when using a Raygun.

imageDescription: Card featuring the B612 Foundation logo and the New Glenn rocket from Blue Origin, a tall white rocket with 'BLUE ORIGIN' text.

name: SpaceX (J)

ocr.ability: MARKETEER: Always win Auction ties.

imageDescription: Card showing the orange SpaceX logo and the Starship rocket, a tall stainless steel vehicle with distinctive grid fins.

name: Norse Astronauts (K)

ocr.ability: SCRUM TROUBLESHOOTERS: Repair any Glitch anywhere.

imageDescription: Card displaying a Swedish royal coat of arms with crown and the OmegA SE rocket, a white vehicle with Swedish flag markings.

name: NASRDA Astronauts (L)

ocr.ability: MOONCABLE: As a once per turn free action, refuel an activated dirt thruster at LEO/Home Orbit with 7 tanks (non-crew thruster) or 1 tank (Crew thruster).

imageDescription: Card showing the NASRDA (Nigerian space agency) green gear logo and the Pegasus XL air-launched rocket carried by an aircraft.

name: Shimizu Corp Entrepreneurs (M)

ocr.ability: SKUNKWORKS: Ignore academia hand limit = may bid in auctions with any number of hand cards.

imageDescription: Card featuring the Shimizu Corporation logo with paper airplane icon and Japanese characters, alongside a lunar lander module and rover.

name: Decanting Network

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Allowed 1 extra Colonist. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: 2002 TX (9:50).

imageDescription: Card depicting two scientists in white lab coats working with cryogenic pods, showing human bodies being prepared for coldnap hibernation.

name: Life Support Test Protocol

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Implant is a free action. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site; you may Discard a Colonist (this is not a Felony). DESTINATION: Quaoar with Promoted Bernal (10:40).

imageDescription: Card showing a spacecraft near Quaoar, a reddish-pink trans-Neptunian object, with the dwarf planet prominently displayed against a starfield.

name: Life Support Reconfig Team

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your Bernals add to Colonist limit even when unanchored. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank; you may swap your Bernal cards (move each to the other Bernal Stack). DESTINATION: Your 2 Anchored non-Home Bernals & Return.

imageDescription: Card depicting a rotating space habitat with multiple modules and solar panels, representing a Bernal sphere-style space station in deep space.

name: Isotope Fueling Station

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: After you do a factory refuel op, gain 1 Isotope at that Factory. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: Your Factory of your isostandard in Neptune zone.

imageDescription: Card showing a spacecraft mining operation on a cratered asteroid near Neptune's moon, with storage tanks and equipment visible on the surface.

name: Warden Proving Ground

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your robonauts are -1 ISRU. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank; Promote your freighter or you may gain a Mobile Factory at your Bank. DESTINATION: Teharonhiyawako (10:20).

imageDescription: Card depicting multiple robotic rovers operating on the surface of Teharonhiyawako, a gray cratered asteroid, testing autonomous systems.

name: TW Evaluation Committee

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: You may use Claim disks as delegates. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site; place 2 delegates on any 1 ideology. DESTINATION: Larissa (10:10).

imageDescription: Card showing Earth from space with a thruster spacecraft in orbit, representing committee evaluation of terrawatt-class propulsion systems.

name: Radiation Shield Prototype

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your Stacks are immune to Belt/CME Rolls. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Mercury Site (6:30, 8:00), then enter 2 Radiation Belt Spaces in the Saturn zone or beyond & Return.

imageDescription: Card depicting a spacecraft with thruster firing near Pluto, the dwarf planet shown as a large pinkish-gray sphere with its distinctive heart feature.

name: Rival Isobank

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: You may exchange 1 Isotope per Turn at your Anchored non-Home Bernal for 6 Aquas. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: Pluto or Charon Factory (9:40, 9:50).

imageDescription: Card showing a space station with HE-3 isotope storage tanks silhouetted against a large full moon, representing an isotope banking facility.

name: TW Stress Test

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Your GW/TW thruster receives a Bonus Pivot. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Enter Solar Oberth, then Uranus zone Synodic Site, & Return.

imageDescription: Card depicting a spacecraft with extended thruster boom performing a close solar pass, with the sun's corona and surface prominently displayed.

name: Iso-Exchange

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Produce your isostandard during a site refuel op at any Factory (with permission). WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Saturn aerostat (8:40) & Return.

imageDescription: Card showing a bulbous spacecraft or aerostat with multiple spherical tanks floating in Saturn's atmosphere, designed for isotope collection.

name: Deep Freeze

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: Before exomigrating, you may Discard the top card from the queue you are drawing from. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site. DESTINATION: Arrokoth (9:50).

imageDescription: Card depicting multiple humans in blue cryogenic hibernation pods with tubes and monitoring equipment, representing deep freeze colonist storage.

name: Atmospheric Iso-Refinery

ocr.ability: FULFILLED ABILITY: If your GW/TW thruster ends its move on an Aerobrake Hazard, that Stack gains 1 Isotope. WHEN FULFILLING: Gain 3 Isotopes at your Bank. DESTINATION: Uranus aerostat (9:20).

imageDescription: Card showing a dragonfly-like atmospheric collection craft with transparent wings flying through Uranus's pale blue-green cloudy atmosphere.

ocr.ability: Factory loading only

name: Fission GCR

ocr.ability: Can liftoff/land on Sites that are less than size 6 without factory-assist. EXOPLANET HUNT FUTURE: Req = Claim Sedna. Effect = (Endgame) 12 VP.

imageDescription: A solar gravitational lensing observatory concept showing a spacecraft at 550 AU with O'Meara aluminum film fresnel lens, solar occulter, MAG boom with flux-gate magnetometers, and 15m megapixel CCD array.

spreadsheet.future: EXOPLANET HUNT FUTURE: Req = Claim Sedna. Effect = (Endgame) 12 VP.

name: Fusion Fragment Sail

ocr.ability: Immune to flares & radiation belts. The sail is steered using inertial-confinement A-LIFT fusion.

imageDescription: A cylindrical spacecraft with CH2-Boron-11 composite target being hit by psec laser pulses, creating fusion particles that drive a sail through radioactive nanoparticles held in an axial magnetic field.

name: Antiproton Sail and Harvester

ocr.ability: +1 net thrust if starting its move on a radiation belt. ANTIMATTER FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with S Dirtside. Effects = double isotope refuel, 10 VP.

imageDescription: A spacecraft with a 75m diameter uranium-coated carbon sail and superconducting loop, featuring an antiproton-driven scintillation generator and positively-charged electrostatic trap for antimatter storage.

spreadsheet.future: ANTIMATTER FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with S Dirtside. Effects = double isotope refuel, 10 VP.

name: HIIPER Beam Rider
imageDescription: An electric engine with helicon plasma generator and inertial electrostatic accelerator, featuring a 312m collector diameter and biased spherical IEC potential well creating a collimated plasma beam.

name: Magnetic Mirror Beam Rider

ocr.ability: Can liftoff/land on Sites that are less than size 6 without factory-assist. STAR WISP FUTURE: Req = Promoted Freighter (End game) at either neutrino sunlens (6VP) or EM sunlens = 11VP.

imageDescription: A beam rider spacecraft with shielded S coil, stem lasers, closed field lines connecting to galactic fields, and neutral Na atom beam at 0.56%c with reflected plasma plume.

spreadsheet.future: STAR WISP FUTURE: Req = Promoted Freighter (End game) at either neutrino sunlens (6 VP) or EM sunlens = 11 VP.

name: Inflatable Solar-heated

ocr.ability: Factory loading only. SOLAR HEATED: If not using Powersat, may move out only as far as the Ceres zone.

imageDescription: A spacecraft with 185m inflatable optics collector directing sunlight through quartz lens and reradiation shield into a carbon-shelled heat exchanger with black Re coating and rhenium foam, connected to ZBO LH2 tank.

name: Archimedes Palmer Lens

ocr.ability: Factory loading only. SOLAR HEATED: If not using Powersat, may move out only as far as the Jupiter zone. TERRAFORM FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal at a non-martian Atmospheric Dirtside. Effect = 8 VP.

imageDescription: A fleet of thousands of photon sails entrained by two intersecting Palmer lasers reflecting sunlight to superheat propellant, shown as a mesh-like sail structure in a purple-tinted atmosphere.

spreadsheet.future: TERRAFORM FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal at a non-Martian Atmospheric Dirtside. Effect = 8 VP.

name: Poodle Steam

ocr.ability: Factory loading only. RADIOISOTOPE: +2 thrust if its move starts on a Factory.

imageDescription: A radioisotope-powered spacecraft with plenum containing radioisotope matrix, H2 hot bleed line, turbopump, and de Laval nozzle, with H2 regenerative cooling line and an astronaut for scale.

name: D-nanotube Dirt Launcher

ocr.ability: BEANSTALK FUTURE: Req = 3+ Space Elevators built by any player. Effect (Endgame) = +3 VP for each Factory connected to a Space Elevator.

imageDescription: A kinetically-supported system with whirling 2mm carbon nanotube cables ejecting regolith at 3 gees, featuring forward roller, 800m bucket loading, nuclear turbines, and 3 gravity buckets.

spreadsheet.future: BEANSTALK FUTURE: Req = 3+ Space Elevators built by any player. Effect (Endgame) = +3 VP for each Factory connected to a Space Elevator.
